entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is the teacher leading the class down a corridor to the staffroom.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is sitting in an armchair in the staffroom and looks around as the class files in.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is a student in Professor Lupin's class.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin and Professor Snape have an interaction in the staffroom, with Snape looking around at the class and Lupin opening the door for them.
Professor Lupin is teaching a class that includes Neville Longbottom.
Professor Snape and Professor Lupin have an interaction in the staffroom, with Snape warning Lupin about Neville Longbottom being in the class.
